quotes.quote: It is not too late to take another path.
There are no wrong turns, only unexpected paths.
The path of your life can change in an instant.
Take the path that leads to nowhere. It's the most fun.
A path is a prior interpretation of the best way to traverse a landscape.
Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
Every path, every street in the world is your walking meditation path.
We cannot hold a torch to light another's path without brightening our own.
Follow your path, and let the people talk.
Sometimes the right path is not always the easiest one.
If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
Just because God's path isn't always understandable, doesn't mean it's not the right path.
Don't confuse your path with your destination. Just because it's stormy now doesn't mean that you aren't headed for sunshine.
If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.
Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
Every path has its puddle.
The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
All paths are the same, leading nowhere. Therefore, pick a path with heart!
If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
There are several paths one can take, but not every path is open to you.
Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
The straight path must sometimes be crooked
One path alone leads to a life of peace. The path of virtueâ€¦..
No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
Choosing a path means having to miss out on others.
The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
The path to youth takes a lifetime.
There is not one path. There is not even the right path. There is only your path.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
